hero.title: Track Your Path to Success
hero.description: Streamline your job search with intelligent application tracking, deadline management, and career insights. Never miss an opportunity again.

cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site, you agree to our use of cookies.

features.title: Everything You Need to Land Your Dream Job

smartTracking.title: Smart Tracking
smartTracking.description: Track your job applications with intelligent automation and insights.

goalManagement.title: Goal Management
goalManagement.description: Set daily, weekly, and monthly application goals. Track your progress and maintain momentum in your job search.

analyticsDashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
analyticsDashboard.description: Gain insights into your job search performance with detailed analytics and success rate tracking.

smartNotifications.title: Smart Notifications
smartNotifications.description: Never miss important deadlines or follow-ups with intelligent reminders and notifications.

documentManager.title: Document Manager
documentManager.description: Store and organize resumes, cover letters, and portfolios. Access them instantly when needed.

jobBoardIntegration.title: Job Board Integration
jobBoardIntegration.description: Connect with popular job boards and import applications automatically. Save time on data entry.
